alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 5:23PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A line of thunderstorms will impact portions of central Montezuma County through 600 PM MST... At 523 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms near Cortez, or 33 miles north of Shiprock, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cortez around 535 PM MST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Dolores. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 491 in Colorado between mile markers 27 and 46. U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 25 and 64. Colorado 145 between mile markers 1 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Southwest San Juan Mountains
